lines:
Received/s 
Answered

6136 University Ave.

OM

Chicago, Illinois

January 5th. 1920 
Dr. Alfred E. Stearns 
Phillips Academy 
Andover, Mass. 
My dear Dr. Stearns:

I beg to acknowledge the 
receipt of your kind letter together with a 
check of $50.00 which came this morning.

It is indeed very kind of 
you not to charge my brother any interest on 
the loan you made him. And I am sure that he

aporetiates your kindness.

Wishing you a very bright 
and happy New Year.

I remain,

Respectfully yours

Bu an
raw: Received/s  Answered  6136 University Ave.  OM  Chicago, Illinois  January 5th. 1920  Dr. Alfred E. Stearns  Phillips Academy  Andover, Mass.  My dear Dr. Stearns:  I beg to acknowledge the  receipt of your kind letter together with a  check of $50.00 which came this morning.  It is indeed very kind of  you not to charge my brother any interest on  the loan you made him. And I am sure that he  aporetiates your kindness.  Wishing you a very bright  and happy New Year.  I remain,  Respectfully yours  Bu an
